about_the_game:
It’s just about party time in Craftworld – ring in the celebrations with Sackboy!

Once he’s all decked out in this New Year’s Costume, you’re ready to spread the new year cheer far and wide. Be sure that you party hard with his New Year Celebration Emote!

Internet connection required to access downloadable content.
detailed_description:
It’s just about party time in Craftworld – ring in the celebrations with Sackboy!

Once he’s all decked out in this New Year’s Costume, you’re ready to spread the new year cheer far and wide. Be sure that you party hard with his New Year Celebration Emote!

Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

name: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure - New Year's Costume

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 @ 2.7GHz, AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 265
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 GB HDD (SSD Recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K @ 3.5GHz AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX580
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 GB HDD (SSD Recommended)

short_description: It’s party time in Craftworld – ring in the celebrations with Sackboy! Once he’s decked out in this New Year’s Costume, you can spread the new year cheer far and wide. Be sure that you party hard with his New Year Celebration Emote! Internet connection required to access downloadable content.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
